General.Name: Wei Chuan Foods Corp
General.Description: Wei Chuan Foods Corporation engages in the manufacturing, processing, and sale of dairy, beverages, and instant food products in Taiwan and internationally. It operates through: Food, Packaging, and Others segments. The company offers tinned food, soy sauce, MSG gourmet powder, seasonings, juice, tetra pack sterilized milk, soy milk, rice milk, cooler drinks, fresh and fermented milk, butter milk, yogurt, gel, and pudding products, as well as coffee, tea, water, sauce, cans, salad, eggs, etc. It also engages in the manufacturing of food molds, injection molds, and plastic bottle caps, as well as packaging and amusement business. The company was incorporated in 1953 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
